availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Catlett (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Cole Catlett in Anderson County in November 1832. Father of Martha Catlett, William Catlett, James Catlett, Mildred Catlett, Elijah Catlett, Amanda Catlett, May Catlett, and George Catlett. Farmer with Valentine Munday in Anderson County in 1850. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1850. Farmer with William Catlett in Anderson County in 1860. Owned seventeen enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Anderson County in 1861.

ab.bibl:

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 101.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 2.
Marriage Records: Kentucky Marriages, (Richmond, KY: Madison County Courthouse), Anderson County 1831-1869, Film # 001550673, p. 526.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Anderson County Administrator Bonds, 1852-1970, p. 146 of microfilm (Accessed through ancestry.com on May 6, 2020).
